name: df-bj-divc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdivc, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(cxp(cccbar, cccbar), cxp(ccchat, ccchat))), wrex(s2, cun(czzbar, czzhat), wceq(co(cv(s2), cmulc, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ||C = { < s0, s1 > |(< s0, s1 > ∈((CCbar × CCbar)⋃(CChat × CChat))∧ ∃(s2 ∈(ZZbar ⋃ ZZhat),(s2[.cc]s0)= s1))}
comment: Definition of the divisibility relation (compare ~ df-dvds ). Since 0 is absorbing, ` |- ( A e. ( CCbar u. CChat ) -> ( A ||C 0 ) ) ` and ` |- ( ( 0 ||C A ) <-> A = 0 ) ` . (Contributed by BJ, 28-Jul-2023.)
